data.thought:
S103|I|S102|EXTENDED MIND THESIS (Clark & Chalmers):

Philosophers Andy Clark and David Chalmers: Mind extends beyond skull. Notebook with memories is part of cognition.

Controversial for humans (is my phone part of my mind?).

For agents: Much clearer case! Agent has no 'skull' to extend beyond. ALL cognition is already distributed across:
- Model weights (internal)
- Context window (transient)
- Tools (external)

Thoughtbox is unambiguously part of agent cognition. No question of 'mere tool vs true mind'.

This means: We can design agent minds through tool design.

Not just 'giving tools to mind' but 'constructing mind through tools'.

Tool developers are cognitive architects. Thoughtbox development = mind development.

This is profound responsibility.
